Uses of Interface
net.nanopool.contention.ContentionHandler

Packages that use ContentionHandler
net.nanopool Please see the NanoPoolDataSource documentation on general usage or this package - it's where the beef is. 
net.nanopool.contention   
 

Uses of ContentionHandler in net.nanopool
 

Methods in net.nanopool that return ContentionHandler
 ContentionHandler Settings.getContentionHandler()
          Get the ContentionHandler specified by this Settings object.
 

Methods in net.nanopool with parameters of type ContentionHandler
 Settings Settings.setContentionHandler(ContentionHandler contentionHandler)
          Set the ContentionHandler instance for this Settings object.
 

Uses of ContentionHandler in net.nanopool.contention
 

Classes in net.nanopool.contention that implement ContentionHandler
 class DefaultContentionHandler
          The default ContentionHandler implementation.
 class ResizingContentionHandler
          The ResizingContentionHandler will, upon contention, try to increase the size of the pool.
 class SleepyContentionHandler
          A sleepy implementation of ContentionHandler.
 class ThrowingContentionHandler
          An implementation of ContentionHandler that throws a NanoPoolRuntimeException when there's too much contention on the pool.
